verses.verse: I <S%G3004>say<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> I <S%G5574>lie<s%> not, my <S%G4893>conscience<s%> <S%G4828>also<s%> <S%G4828>bearing<s%> me <S%G4828>witness<s%> in the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost,<s%>
That I <S%G2076>have<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G3077>heaviness<s%> and <S%G88>continual<s%> <S%G3601>sorrow<s%> in my <S%G2588>heart.<s%>

For I could <S%G2172>wish<s%> that <S%G846>myself<s%> were <S%G331>accursed<s%> from <S%G5547>Christ<s%> for my <S%G80>brothers,<s%> my <S%G4773>kinsmen<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4561>flesh:<s%>

<S%G3748>Who<s%> are <S%G2475>Israelites;<s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> pertains the <S%G5206>adoption,<s%> and the <S%G1391>glory,<s%> and the <S%G1242>covenants,<s%> and the <S%G3548>giving<s%> of the <S%G3548>law,<s%> and the <S%G2999>service<s%> of God, and the <S%G1860>promises;<s%>

<S%G3739>Whose<s%> are the <S%G3962>fathers,<s%> and of <S%G3739>whom<s%> as <S%G2596>concerning<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> came, <S%G3588>who<s%> is <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2128>blessed<s%> for <S%G165>ever.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>

Not as <S%G3754>though<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> has taken <S%G1601>none<s%> <S%G1601>effect.<s%> For they are not <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2474>Israel,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are of <S%G2474>Israel:<s%>

<S%G3761>Neither,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> they are the <S%G4690>seed<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> are they <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5043>children:<s%> but, In <S%G2464>Isaac<s%> shall your <S%G4690>seed<s%> be <S%G2564>called.<s%>

That is, They which are the <S%G5043>children<s%> of the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> are not the <S%G5043>children<s%> of <S%G2316>God:<s%> but the <S%G5043>children<s%> of the <S%G1860>promise<s%> are <S%G3049>counted<s%> for the <S%G4690>seed.<s%>

For <S%G3778>this<s%> is the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G1860>promise,<s%> <S%G2596>At<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> will I <S%G2064>come,<s%> and <S%G4564>Sarah<s%> shall <S%G2071>have<s%> a <S%G5207>son.<s%>
And not <S%G3440>only<s%> this; but when <S%G4479>Rebecca<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> had <S%G2845>conceived<s%> <S%G2192><s%> by <S%G1520>one,<s%> even by our <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2464>Isaac;<s%>

(For the children being not <S%G3380>yet<s%> <S%G1080>born,<s%> <S%G3366>neither<s%> having <S%G4238>done<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2556>evil,<s%> that the <S%G4286>purpose<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G1589>election<s%> might <S%G3306>stand,<s%> not of <S%G2041>works,<s%> but of him that <S%G2564>calls;<s%>)
It was <S%G4483>said<s%> to her, The <S%G3187>elder<s%> shall <S%G1398>serve<s%> the <S%G1640>younger.<s%>
As it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G2384>Jacob<s%> <S%G2071>have<s%> I <S%G25>loved,<s%> but <S%G2269>Esau<s%> <S%G2071>have<s%> I <S%G3404>hated.<s%>
<S%G5101>What<s%> shall we <S%G2046>say<s%> <S%G3767>then?<s%> Is there <S%G93>unrighteousness<s%> with <S%G2316>God?<s%> <S%G3361>God<s%> <S%G1096><s%> <S%G3361>forbid.<s%> <S%G1096><s%>

For he <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G3475>Moses,<s%> I will have <S%G1653>mercy<s%> on <S%G3739>whom<s%> I will have <S%G1653>mercy,<s%> and I will have <S%G3627>compassion<s%> on <S%G3739>whom<s%> I will have <S%G3627>compassion.<s%>
<S%G686>So<s%> <S%G686>then<s%> it is not of him that <S%G2309>wills,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> of him that <S%G5143>runs,<s%> but of <S%G2316>God<s%> that <S%G1653>shows<s%> <S%G1653>mercy.<s%>

For the <S%G1124>scripture<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G5328>Pharaoh,<s%> Even for <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G846>same<s%> purpose have I <S%G1825>raised<s%> you up, that I might <S%G1731>show<s%> my <S%G1411>power<s%> in you, and that my <S%G3686>name<s%> might be <S%G1229>declared<s%> <S%G1722>throughout<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1093>earth.<s%>
<S%G686>Therefore<s%> <S%G3767><s%> has he <S%G1653>mercy<s%> on <S%G3739>whom<s%> he <S%G2309>will<s%> have mercy, and <S%G3739>whom<s%> he <S%G2309>will<s%> he <S%G4645>hardens.<s%>
You will <S%G2046>say<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> to me, <S%G5101>Why<s%> does he <S%G2089>yet<s%> find <S%G3201>fault?<s%> For <S%G5101>who<s%> has <S%G436>resisted<s%> his <S%G1013>will?<s%>

<S%G3304>No<s%> but, O <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G1488>are<s%> you that <S%G470>reply<s%> <S%G470>against<s%> <S%G2316>God?<s%> Shall the <S%G4110>thing<s%> <S%G4110>formed<s%> <S%G2046>say<s%> to him that <S%G4110>formed<s%> it, <S%G5101>Why<s%> have you <S%G4160>made<s%> me <S%G3779>thus?<s%>

<S%G2192>Has<s%> not the <S%G2763>potter<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> over the <S%G4081>clay,<s%> of the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G5445>lump<s%> to <S%G4160>make<s%> one <S%G4632>vessel<s%> to <S%G5092>honor,<s%> and <S%G3739>another<s%> to <S%G819>dishonor?<s%>

What <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2309>willing<s%> to <S%G1731>show<s%> his <S%G3709>wrath,<s%> and to <S%G1107>make<s%> his <S%G1415>power<s%> <S%G1107>known,<s%> <S%G5342>endured<s%> with <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3115>long-suffering<s%> the <S%G4632>vessels<s%> of <S%G3709>wrath<s%> <S%G2675>fitted<s%> to <S%G684>destruction:<s%>

And that he might <S%G1107>make<s%> <S%G1107>known<s%> the <S%G4149>riches<s%> of his <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G4632>vessels<s%> of <S%G1656>mercy,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he had <S%G4282>before<s%> <S%G4282>prepared<s%> to <S%G1391>glory,<s%>
<S%G2532>Even<s%> us, <S%G3739>whom<s%> he has <S%G2564>called,<s%> not of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G3440>only,<s%> but <S%G2532>also<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles?<s%>

As he <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> in <S%G5617>Osee,<s%> I will <S%G2564>call<s%> them my <S%G2992>people,<s%> which were not my <S%G2992>people;<s%> and her <S%G25>beloved,<s%> which was not <S%G25>beloved.<s%>

And it shall <S%G1511>come<s%> to pass, that in the <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> it was <S%G4483>said<s%> to them, You are not my <S%G2992>people;<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> shall they be <S%G2564>called<s%> the <S%G5207>children<s%> of the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G2268>Esaias<s%> <S%G1161>also<s%> <S%G2896>cries<s%> <S%G5228>concerning<s%> <S%G2474>Israel,<s%> <S%G1437>Though<s%> the <S%G706>number<s%> of the <S%G5207>children<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel<s%> be as the <S%G285>sand<s%> of the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> a <S%G2640>remnant<s%> shall be <S%G4982>saved:<s%>

For he will <S%G4931>finish<s%> the <S%G3056>work,<s%> and <S%G4932>cut<s%> it <S%G4932>short<s%> in <S%G1343>righteousness:<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> a <S%G4932>short<s%> <S%G3056>work<s%> will the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G4160>make<s%> on the <S%G1093>earth.<s%>

And as <S%G2268>Esaias<s%> <S%G4280>said<s%> <S%G4280>before,<s%> <S%G1508>Except<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> of <S%G4519>Sabaoth<s%> had <S%G1459>left<s%> us a <S%G4690>seed,<s%> we had <S%G1096>been<s%> as <S%G4670>Sodoma,<s%> and been <S%G3666>made<s%> <S%G3666>like<s%> to <S%G1116>Gomorrha.<s%>

<S%G5101>What<s%> shall we <S%G2046>say<s%> <S%G3767>then?<s%> That the <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G1377>followed<s%> not after <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> have <S%G2638>attained<s%> to <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> <S%G1161>even<s%> the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is of <S%G4102>faith.<s%>
But <S%G2474>Israel,<s%> which <S%G1377>followed<s%> after the <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> has not <S%G5348>attained<s%> to the <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness.<s%>

<S%G1302>Why?<s%> <S%G3754>Because<s%> they <S%G2212>sought<s%> it not by <S%G4102>faith,<s%> but as it were by the <S%G2041>works<s%> of the <S%G3551>law.<s%> For they <S%G4350>stumbled<s%> at that stumbling <S%G3037>stone;<s%>

As it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> I <S%G5087>lay<s%> in <S%G4622>Sion<s%> a stumbling <S%G3037>stone<s%> <S%G4348><s%> and <S%G4073>rock<s%> of <S%G4625>offense:<s%> and <S%G3956>whoever<s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4100>believes<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> him shall not be <S%G2617>ashamed.<s%>
